basics.name: AMANDA FRY
basics.label: Community Outreach ~ Public Awareness ~ Relationship Building
basics.summary: As an extremely talented, self-motivated, enthusiastic public relations professional with many years of sound experience, l am not the type to rest on his achievements, but instead I am always seeking new challenges. I have a proven and creative talent with excellent writing skills and an expertise in developing public outreach initiatives.   My experience has also given me a high level of performance in relationship building, decision-making and communicating.

highlights: Teach class of 10-15 students, ages 12 and up.
Maintain order in the classroom
Choreograph and instruct students for final recital
Serve as the Editor for a small weekly newspaper
Manage all websites and social media
Write articles, cover events, and gather news information for all five communities in Platte County
Attend government meetings and community events
Paginate all pages in the newspaper
Meet all press deadlines
Oversee staff writers and contributing writers

work.company: City of Cheyenne- Parks and Recreation Division
highlights: Assist in preparation for adult and youth sports programs
Recruit coaches for youth sports teams
Provide the public with resources and information for the Parks and Recreation Division, or direct them to the proper department for assistance
Address billing issues and questions
Record transactions and prepare bank deposits each day

work.company: Gear UP Program, Laramie County Community College
highlights: Work with 7-12th-grade students in preparing for college
Educate and guide students in finding financial aid, college programs
Audit paperwork
Assist with public events held for program

work.company: Farmers Insurance Group – Eric Romano Agency
highlights: Answered questions from customers regarding insurance policies
Wrote new business for new and existing customers
Explained products, premiums, and options for customers
Addressed technical issues brought to me by students and faculty in computer lab
Assigned maintenance issues to workers
Filmed staff and clients for educational videos
Edited footage and create DVDs for staff training
Followed HIPPA regulations regarding confidential information
Gathered information to write coherent and accurate articles for a weekly newspaper
Attended meetings, research and find information sources, build a repertoire with local individuals and public officials
Covered all local sports matches and teams, interview coaches, players
Photographed events, meetings, sport events and created ads according to customer specifications
Served as interim editor, or take over editor duties, when needed

courses: Board member, Platte County Economic Development
Public Relations Volunteer, American Red Cross, Wyoming Chapter

awards.awarder: Winner of the High Plains Register Best Story Award
Winner of a Wyoming Press Association Honorable Mention for article series
Winner of Wyoming Press Association Pacemaker Award in photography
